# wildcam


## Installation

You can install the development version of wildcam with:

``` r
remotes::install_gitlab("robit.a/wildcam")
```


This package depends on `data.table`, `sf`, `units`. System system dependencies include `udunits` ([see here](https://github.com/r-quantities/units#installation)), and GDAL, GEOS and PROJ4 ([see here](https://github.com/r-spatial/sf/#installing)). Windows users, make sure to use [RTools](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/).
